TopicTitle: Crash log CTD EVA on Mun

Articles.Content:
ksp failed during a mun eva. I pressed space to let go of the ladder and the screen went black. logs attached.

Stock build (no mods)

build id = 00642

2014-10-07_10-59-44

Branch: master

logs: 2014-10-08_194208.zip

http://www./download/sppezw4j38lv210

Was going to make a new thread until I saw this, my issue may be related. Crash to Desktop upon first EVA (where the kerbal actually touches the ground). Happened in Career and Science mode.

Stock build .25 (no mods)

build id = 00642

2014-10-07_10-59-44

Branch: master

After landing a spacecraft, send Kerbal on an EVA.

Press space to let go of the ladder.

As soon as his feet touch the dirt/earth it will CTD.

This only happened on my FIRST EVA per game mode.

http://www./view/492p0dntag1k7hq/error_1of2.log

http://www./view/d492t236p9o4xyw/error_2of2.log
